Articles.Content:
The new kerbal classes are great (Pilot, Scientist, Engineer) but I find it a pain to look through the orbital information to see who is what. My suggestion is a "Class Icon" on their portraits so you can see their class. I've made a quick mockup of basic clipart (rocket, test tube & wrench) showing their jobs. Perhaps alternately, showing the icon when you hover over them would be cool.

Just a thought.
Yes, definitely. I keep forgetting who the Science Guy is within the orange suits.

Yes, definitely. I keep forgetting who the Science Guy is within the orange suits.

It's Bob; if it helps, remember Bill's the stupid one of the 3 (yet he's an engineer?) and I'm sure everyone has no problems remembering Jeb's the pilot

EDIT(derp): Oh yes, good idea!
